item.title: Open-sources and Apps
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: OpenThread Commissioner Implementation in Java OpenThread’s open-source project currently offers a native Commissioner CLI and an Android app for external commissioning, but no standalone Java-based implementation. This project aims to bridge that gap by providing a step-by-step guide for developers to build an external Commissioner in Java. ☞ Github ☞ Learn More MQTT-Remote This is a web-based remote control for a led. It is a soft button on web that works in sync with hardware button.
